raw_mentions: For example, the applicants have discovered that Nα-phenyl-N-(2-pyridyl)-phenylalaninamide, a new composition of matter according to general structural formula (I), (II), (III), or (IV), inhibits Mycobacterium tuberculosis RNA polymerase in vitro (IC50 ˜1 μM) and inhibits the growth of Mycobacterium smegmatis in culture (MIC ˜3 μg/ml).

molecule_name: compound according to general structural formula (I), (II), (III), or (IV), or a salt thereof
raw_mentions: In certain embodiments, the compound according to general structural formula (I), (II), (III), or (IV), or a salt thereof, has an IC50 of less than about 25 micromolar for inhibiting an RNA polymerase from a bacterium.
